full_summary:
## Tender Announcement for Shielded Enclosures Maintenance (CFB Halifax)
toc: not applicable

### Tender Information
#### Reference and Solicitation Information
* Reference Number: `WS4282874488-Doc4282927147`
* Solicitation Number: `WS4282874488`
* Amendment Number: `2`
* Publication Date: `2023-10-30`
* Tender Closure Date: `2023-11-30T14:00:00`

#### Contract and Tender Status Information
* Tender Status: `Expired`
* Procurement Category: `SRV`
* Procurement Method: `Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissioner`
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), etc.

#### Contract and Site Information
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* End User Entities: Department of National Defence (DND)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: Nova Scotia

### Tender Description
The Government of Canada has a requirement for the furnishing of all labour, material, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision required to perform scheduled preventive maintenance and repair of shielded enclosures at various locations of CFB Halifax.
The duration of the contract is two years with three optional one-year periods.

### Bidding and Protest Requirements
* Respondents may submit a written request for debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation with the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
* Further details on the above requirements are provided in the tender document.

### Additional Information
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17865771?extsite=MTc4NjU3NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Information
	+ Nicole Fesseha (SPAC/PSPC)
		- Email: nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
		- Telephone: Not provided
		- Fax: Not provided
		- Address: Not provided
